import "../styles/moviedetails.scss"; import moment from "moment"; import useFetch from "../hooks/useFetch"; type Movie = { id: number, title: string, image: string, description: string, release: string, rating: number, duration: number, country: string, budget: number, genres: string[], actors: string[], reviews: { user: string, date: string, content: string } }; export default function MovieDetails() { const url = "https://localhost:7063/movies/" + window.location.pathname.substring( window.location.pathname.lastIndexOf("/") + 1 ); const { data: movie, error, loading } = useFetch(url); return (
